projects.name: Goscanner
details: Built a high-speed, concurrent port scanner in Golang using goroutines for efficient parallel scanning.
Implemented SYN scanning for stealthier and faster network reconnaissance.

projects.name: MyIP
details: Developed a TUI tool that fetches and displays IP addresses in a clear, user-friendly format.
Addressed the pain point of confusing ifconfig and ipconfig outputs by simplifying network diagnostics.

projects.name: CodingType
details: Developed a web application for generating random coding types.
Built with Next and TailwindCSS, featuring a responsive design and intuitive user interface.
Inspired by Monkeytype, offering customizable typing tests with real time words per minute tracking.

projects.name: Valentine Roses
details: Developed a web application for sending virtual roses to loved ones on Valentine's Day.
Built with Next and TailwindCSS, featuring a responsive design and intuitive user interface.

projects.name: Zigbrute
details: Developed a CLI tool for brute force attacks on websites.
Built with Zig for high performance and efficiency.

projects.name: Reverse Shell Gen
details: Developed a CLI tool for generating reverse shells in various programming languages.
Built with Go for high performance and efficiency.

contributions.name: Thai Bad Words
details: Co-Contributed to a TypeScript library for detecting Thai bad words.
Refactored the code to improve performance by changing the data structure to use Trie.
Implemented a unit test for the library with Jest.

contributions.name: Lynx
details: Contributed to the Lynx project's .gitignore file by adding rules to exclude auto generated files, particularly Gradle build artifacts.

writings.name: เขียนเว็บแบบไม่ต้องง้อ JavaScript ด้วย HTMX
writings.details: Writing about What is HTMX and how to use it to build a web application.

writings.name: WebAssembly (WASM) ด้วยภาษา Zig — เขียนเว็บด้วยความเร็วระดับ Native
writings.details: Writing about what is WebAssembly and how to use it with Zig.

technologies.details: ReactJS, NextJS, NestJS, SvelteJS, AstroJs, Fiber, Echo, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, React Native
AWS, GCP, Firebase, Vercel, Github Actions, CloudFlare

details: Develop and maintain web applications using React, Next.js, TailwindCSS and mores.
